headline: Enphase Energy (NasdaqGM:ENPH) Expands Japan Footprint with ITOCHU and New Solar Mandate
summary: Enphase Energy (NasdaqGM:ENPH) announced the shipment of its IQ8 Microinverters in Japan, aiming to leverage the new solar mandate in Tokyo. Despite positive earnings and guidance updates on April 22, Enphase's stock saw a 10% decline over the past week, contrasting with the generally rising market. While this movement might reflect broader market volatility given tariff news, it's worth considering that Enphase's strategic moves in Japan align with supportive regulatory contexts, which could...

headline: Generac (GNRC) To Report Earnings Tomorrow: Here Is What To Expect
summary: Power generation products company Generac (NYSE:GNRC) will be reporting results tomorrow before market open. Here’s what you need to know.
